xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 2.5.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma » Nakammaduka
Pañcaka
Kusalattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nakammaduka
Pañcaka
804Nakammapaccayā nahetupaccayā naadhipatipaccayā napurejātapaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ.
805(Avasesāni padāni etenupāyena vitthāretabbāni. Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Tikaup Navipākaduka >>
